name: FizzBuzz [with Android Wear] - [with beta tests]
description:
-Description-

FizzBuzz (Download) is a game in which you always see one number on the screen. Below there are three buttons (Fizz, Buzz and FizzBuzz). If the shown number is divisible by 3 you have to press Fizz if it is divisible by 5 press Buzz and if it is divisible by 3 and 5 press FizzBuzz. If it is not divisible by 3 or 5 just wait for the next number.
This sounds easy, but you only have a short amount of time to make the right decision. The Android Wear part of the app is exactly the same. If you reach a new highscore on your smartwatch it will be automatically synchronized with the device.

-Youtube-
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XuyVfJg8fRo

-Features-

  • 3 modes. In "classic" the shown number counts from 1 to infinity. In "random" it always shows one random number. In "custom" you can change the counter, Fizz and Buzz in the settings.
  • Google Play Game Services are integrated so that the user can unlock achievements and compete in a global leaderboard.
